ygData.subject: Cracked Flute
ygData.msgSnippet: Was standing around playing my flute the other day (most folks haven t seen this animation, and it certainly seems to entertain them), drunk as a giant skunk,
ygData.messageBody:
Was standing around playing my flute the other day (most folks haven't seen
this animation, and it certainly seems to entertain them), drunk as a giant
skunk, and some fellow asked me if I knew what a cracked flute did. I told
him I'd never heard of it, and remarked it sounded as if a "cracked" flute
wouldn't work every well. He told me it was involved with a quest, but
before I could get any more information out of him his party group gated
away. Wondering if this is a broken flute for some quest delivery, or
perhaps something nice to have. Think the fellow wondered the same thing,
probably would have sold it to me for 200 pp or some such nonsense. He was
high-level, so may be a higher level quest? (Sigh... where do you start
higher level quests anyway??)

Roop
